Category:Battles of the Emperor's ritual crisis

nodes.text: During the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a unit of Voss commandos under the command of Tala-Reh attacked the Gormak Lands on the planet Voss in order to serve as a distraction for the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython, who was infiltrating the Gormak city of Gorma-Koss.
